function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long-term exposure to low viral concentration in high-density residential neighborhoods","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation and air filtration, reduced population density","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters","People":"Residents of high-density residential neighborhoods","Owner":"Local government, property owners, urban planners"},{"Description":"Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in indoor environments","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 within communities","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation, air purification, and adherence to airborne infection control measures","Technologies":"UVGI air disinfection, HEPA filters, negative pressure rooms","People":"Residents, visitors, and healthcare workers in indoor environments","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 in air samples collected from patient's rooms in hospitals","Impact":"Increased risk of nosocomial transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Strict infection control measures, isolation protocols, and improved ventilation systems","Technologies":"UV disinfection, air sterilization units, isolation room ventilation systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors in hospitals","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control teams, facility maintenance staff"}]}
